entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -30.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 11:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -30.8°C
Pressure: 103.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -34.2°C
Wind: W 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
